attributes.action: Allow driving instructors to carry out a driving test.
attributes.additional_details: To reduce the backlog of driving test to enable driving students to carry on with their lives and enable access t work places in other areas
attributes.background: DVSA could carry out random checks by way of another test with a DVSA tester to ensure that the standards are being upheld.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign the following petitions:

Exempt driving tests and lessons from COVID-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462

Publish a plan for dealing with the driving test backlog
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558971
